transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir, IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu, call kiya tha aapne.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Ha, to aap jo hai dusri wali mail id, primary jo mail id hai usi ko verify kar rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi, usko nahi, dusra kar rahe hain.
Executive: Jaise ki yaha pe jo mail id registered hai aapke.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ek second aap line par rahe, main check kar leti hu. 92abhi.aby wala hoga.
Customer: Dekh lo ek baar.

Executive: Ha ji, aapka jo mail id registered hai na hamare paas se.
Executive: Wo hai.
Executive: Ek second, kya humne dekha.
Executive: Primary mail id mein G se kuch shuru hai.
Executive: Aur H bhi.
Executive: G se shuru hai fir teen kuch, kuch teen letter hoga fir H hai. Fir teen letter hai fir B hai @gmail.com, ye kaunsa mail id hai?
Customer: Ha, 92abhi.aby@gmail.com.
Executive: 92abhi, correct. Isi ko verify kar rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi, isko hum change karna chah rahe the. Rukma Tech Private Limited@gmail.com.
Executive: Aap system pe online hai laptop pe?
Customer: Ha ji ji ji.
Executive: Laptop pe pehle primary, pehle profile pe jaiega, profile pe.
Customer: Profile pe hi hai.
Executive: Profile pe click karenge to waha pe upar edit ka option aa raha hai na? Abhishek Yadav, Rukma Enterprises jo likha hai, edit ka option aa raha hai? Company logo ke upar. Ab us pe edit pe aapne click kiya to wo jo mail id dikh rahi hai primary email, hai na? Usko zara hataiye waha se.
Customer: To wahi to hata rahe hain mam to nahi hat raha hai na, jaise.
Executive: Hat hi nahi raha hai?
Customer: Nahi, abhi ek minute main kar raha hu.
Executive: Hata ke dekhiye.
Customer: Ek minute mam.
Customer: Ye jo hai add nahi, matlab isko kaise hatana hai? Dusra mang raha hai jo you are getting change jo hai primary id future communication IndiaMART jo hai delivery hai. Aur naya email id.
Executive: Kya kya likh ke aaya?
Customer: Aa raha hai jo hai you are jo hai going to jo hai change your primary email id hai. All future mein hai communication for IndiaMART including all business inquiry will be jo hai delivered on this. Ha, theek hai, ek step kijiye, theek hai, ek step kijiye.
Customer: To isme niche de raha hai naya email id dalne ke liye, main wo email id dal de raha hu.
Executive: Hmm, to fir?
Customer: Ab uske baad likh raha hai same jo hai my jo hai current email id as my jo hai alternate email id.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To wo keh raha hai ki ye jo primary wala hai nine wala isko alternate bana diya jaye aur jo aap de rahe hain usko primary bana diya jaye, wo ye kehna chah raha hai.
Executive: Ha, to ye matlab ye click kar du?
Executive: Kariye. Isse kya hoga ki jo 92abhi wala jo hai wo secondary ban jayega aur primary pe jo hai Rukma wala dal denge.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji, wahi chah rahe hain.
Executive: Wahi kariye, click kariye usko.
Customer: Ab yehi jo hai.
Executive: Uske baad kya likh raha hai?
Customer: Ab uske baad aa raha hai mam jo hai email id pe wo OTP bheja hai, to ab isi pe to OTP nahi aa raha hai na, ye samasya hai email id pe.
Executive: OTP nahi aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi. Kaunse wale pe?
Customer: Ab ye jo Rukma Tech jo hai Private Limited wale pe jo hai OTP bheja hai lekin isse aa nahi raha hai.
Executive: Nahi, ye abhi wale pe ja raha hoga, 92abhi wala dekhiyega.
Customer: Ek minute main switch karta hu. Kyunki abhi change nahi hua hai na to wo 92 wala jo register hai us pe ja raha hoga, dekhiye. Aur nahi ja raha hai to char panch mail pehle delete kariye. Char panch mail delete karenge na tabhi jo hai wo jayega kyunki wo bounce ho raha tha na to ya to space nahi hoga.
Executive: Ye to naya hai, naya wala is pe likha bhi hai jaise jo hai kis pe bhej raha hai, Rukma Tech pe wo bhej raha hai.
Executive: Likha hai Rukma Tech pe bhej raha hai? Rukma Tech kariye aise dekhiye spam mein to nahi ja raha hai, spam mein dekhiyega.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Spam mein bhi nahi, is pe bhi nahi aaya.
Executive: Spam mein nahi, char panch mail zara delete kariyega, delete karke dekhiye.
Customer: Ye to abhi naya hai, isme kuch hai hi nahi, abhi to khali khali hai.
Executive: Hmm? Accha naya hai?
Customer: Naya hai ji. Ji. Fir se ek baar refresh kariyega, spam mein agar nahi ja raha hai to.
Customer: Main resend kar lu?
Executive: Hmm. Resend pe bhi dekhiye.
Executive: Resend karke dekhiye.
Customer: Resend bhi kar diya hu. Ek baar dusra wala bhi check karo sir, dono pe ho sakta hai ja raha ho, wo bhi wala check kijiye 92 wala jo hai.

Customer: Is pe to nahi aa raha hai, na is pe aa raha hai, dono pe main check kar liya. Email id waise jo hai isko fir se dobara maine wo kiya tha primary wale ko paid wala leke kiya tha to fir ho gaya lekin main use change nahi karna chah raha tha, primary pe isko rakhna chah raha tha.
Executive: Ek kaam karti hu, main zara ticket khol ke dekhti hu. Nayi mail id kya hai bataiyega?
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Main team se bolti hu change karne ko, kya pata unse ho jaye. Ek baar bataiyega naya wala mail id kya hai jo aap register karna chah rahe hain?
Customer: RUKMA.
Executive: RUKMA, ruko mam.
Customer: Tech T E C H.
Executive: Tech?
Customer: Ha ji mam, Tech.
Executive: Aage? PVTLTD matlab private limited@gmail.com.
Executive: gmail.com aur.
Executive: Hum yaha se na ye ticket khol de rahe hain.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai. Aur thoda wait karte hain, team se kya revert aata hai. Fir hum aapko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sorry sir. Fir hum aapko batate hain, theek hai?
Customer: Okay. Humne ticket yaha se khol diya. Theek hai?
Executive: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to change primary email ID.

- OTP not received on the new email.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to change primary email ID.

- Executive opened a ticket for the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform customer after team revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- email id, otp, profile, ticket
